articles.title: 'Be happy, Mummy': Benjamin Tan's mum dies, almost 2 years after falling into coma - AsiaOne
articles.description: Local actor Benjamin Tan's mother has died, close to two years after the 53-year-old first slipped into a coma. He paid tribute to his mum on his social media pages on Saturday (April 16). "I hope I made you proud in this life. I hope I can still be your son …
articles.content:
Local actor Benjamin Tan's mother has died, close to two years after the 53-year-old first slipped into a coma. 
He paid tribute to his mum on his social media pages on Saturday (April 16).

articles.title: Taliban summons Pakistan's ambassador over airstrikes in Afghanistan - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: Afghanistan's Taliban summoned Pakistan's ambassador to convey concerns to the Pakistan government over the recent airstrikes in different parts of Af
articles.content: Taliban summons Pakistan's ambassador over airstrikes in Afghanistan

articles.author: Gabriel Tan
articles.title: JDT off to a flyer in ACL 2022; Lion City Sailors get reality check being among Asia's elite - ESPN
articles.description: The AFC Champions League 2022 East Zone began on Friday with Johor Darul Ta'zim off to a flyer, while Lion City Sailors were given a reality check.
articles.content:
